title: Observations vpon historie by W.H., Esq.
author: Habington, William, 1605-1654.
publisher: Printed by T. Cotes for Will. Cooke ...,
notes: Attributed to William Habington. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Six unrelated essays on: Henry II and Richard I of England, the battle of Varna, the fall of Constantinople, Louis XI and Charles V of France.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
